00054 Range::Range(MasterClientPtr &master_client_ptr, const TableIdentifier *identifier,
00055              SchemaPtr &schema_ptr, const RangeSpec *range, const RangeState *state)
00056     : m_master_client_ptr(master_client_ptr), m_identifier(*identifier),
00057       m_schema(schema_ptr), m_maintenance_in_progress(false),
00058       m_last_logical_timestamp(0), m_added_inserts(0), m_state(*state),
00059       m_error(Error::OK) {
00060   AccessGroup *ag;
00061 
00062   memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00063 
00064   if (m_state.soft_limit == 0 || m_state.soft_limit > Global::range_max_bytes)
00065     m_state.soft_limit = Global::range_max_bytes;
00066 
00067   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00068   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00069 
00070   m_name = std::string(identifier->name) + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00071 
00072   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0 && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00073 
00074   m_column_family_vector.resize(m_schema->get_max_column_family_id() + 1);
00075 
00076   list<Schema::AccessGroup *> *aglist = m_schema->get_access_group_list();
00077 
00078   for (list<Schema::AccessGroup *>::iterator ag_it = aglist->begin(); ag_it != aglist->end(); ag_it++) {
00079     ag = new AccessGroup(identifier, m_schema, (*ag_it), range);
00080     m_access_group_map[(*ag_it)->name] = ag;
00081     m_access_group_vector.push_back(ag);
00082     for (list<Schema::ColumnFamily *>::iterator cf_it = (*ag_it)->columns.begin(); cf_it != (*ag_it)->columns.end(); cf_it++)
00083       m_column_family_vector[(*cf_it)->id] = ag;
00084   }
00085 
00086   if (m_is_root) {
00087     MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema);
00088     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00089   }
00090   else {
00091     MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, m_end_row);
00092     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00093   }
00094 
00098   if (m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED) {
00099     m_split_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00100     m_split_row = m_state.split_point;
00101   }
00102 
00103   std::cout << "Range object for " << m_name << " constructed\n";
00104   std::cout << *state << endl;
00105 
00106   return;
00107 }

00112 Range::~Range() {
00113   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00114     delete m_access_group_vector[i];
00115 }

00122 void Range::load_cell_stores(Metadata *metadata) {
00123   int error;
00124   AccessGroup *ag;
00125   CellStorePtr cellstore;
00126   uint32_t csid;
00127   const char *base, *ptr, *end;
00128   std::vector<std::string> csvec;
00129   std::string ag_name;
00130   std::string files;
00131   std::string file_str;
00132 
00133   metadata->reset_files_scan();
00134 
00135   while (metadata->get_next_files(ag_name, files)) {
00136     csvec.clear();
00137 
00138     if ((ag = m_access_group_map[ag_name]) == 0) {
00139       HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized access group name '%s' found in METADATA for table '%s'", ag_name.c_str(), m_identifier.name);
00140       continue;
00141     }
00142 
00143     ptr = base = (const char *)files.c_str();
00144     end = base + strlen(base);
00145     while (ptr < end) {
00146 
00147       while (*ptr != ';' && ptr < end)
00148         ptr++;
00149 
00150       file_str = std::string(base, ptr-base);
00151       boost::trim(file_str);
00152 
00153       if (file_str[0] == '#')
00154         file_str = file_str.substr(1);
00155 
00156       if (file_str != "")
00157         csvec.push_back(file_str);
00158 
00159       ++ptr;
00160       base = ptr;
00161     }
00162 
00163     for (size_t i=0; i<csvec.size(); i++) {
00164 
00165       HT_INFOF("Loading CellStore %s", csvec[i].c_str());
00166 
00167       cellstore = new CellStoreV0(Global::dfs);
00168 
00169       if (!extract_csid_from_path(csvec[i], &csid)) {
00170         HT_ERRORF("Unable to extract cell store ID from path '%s'", csvec[i].c_str());
00171         continue;
00172       }
00173       if ((error = cellstore->open(csvec[i].c_str(), m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str())) != Error::OK) {
00174         // this should throw an exception
00175         HT_ERRORF("Problem opening cell store '%s', skipping...", csvec[i].c_str());
00176         continue;
00177       }
00178       if ((error = cellstore->load_index()) != Error::OK) {
00179         // this should throw an exception
00180         HT_ERRORF("Problem loading index of cell store '%s', skipping...", csvec[i].c_str());
00181         continue;
00182       }
00183 
00184       ag->add_cell_store(cellstore, csid);
00185     }
00186 
00187   }
00188 
00189 }

00195 bool Range::extract_csid_from_path(std::string &path, uint32_t *csidp) {
00196   const char *base;
00197 
00198   if ((base = strrchr(path.c_str(), '/')) == 0 || strncmp(base, "/cs", 3))
00199     *csidp = 0;
00200   else
00201     *csidp = atoi(base+3);
00202 
00203   return true;
00204 }

00209 int Range::add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, int64_t real_timestamp) {
00210   Key key_comps;
00211 
00212   if (m_error)
00213     return m_error;
00214 
00215   if (!key_comps.load(key))
00216     return Error::BAD_KEY;
00217 
00218   if (key_comps.column_family_code >= m_column_family_vector.size()) {
00219     HT_ERRORF("Bad column family (%d)", key_comps.column_family_code);
00220     return Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY;
00221   }
00222 
00237   if (key_comps.timestamp > m_last_logical_timestamp)
00238     m_last_logical_timestamp = key_comps.timestamp;
00239 
00240   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00241     for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++) {
00242       (*iter).second->add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00243     }
00244   }
00245   else
00246     m_column_family_vector[key_comps.column_family_code]->add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00247 
00248   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_INSERT)
00249     m_added_inserts++;
00250   else
00251     m_added_deletes[key_comps.flag]++;
00252 
00253   return Error::OK;
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00259 int Range::replay_add(const ByteString key, const ByteString value, int64_t real_timestamp, uint32_t *num_addedp) {
00260   Key key_comps;
00261 
00262   HT_EXPECT(key_comps.load(key), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00263 
00264   *num_addedp = 0;
00265 
00266   if (key_comps.column_family_code >= m_column_family_vector.size()) {
00267     HT_ERRORF("Bad column family (%d)", key_comps.column_family_code);
00268     return Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_COLUMNFAMILY;
00269   }
00270 
00271   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00272     for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++) {
00273       if ((*iter).second->replay_add(key, value, real_timestamp))
00274         (*num_addedp)++;
00275     }
00276   }
00277   else {
00278     if (m_column_family_vector[key_comps.column_family_code]->replay_add(key, value, real_timestamp))
00279       (*num_addedp)++;
00280   }
00281 
00282   if (key_comps.flag == FLAG_INSERT)
00283     m_added_inserts++;
00284   else
00285     m_added_deletes[key_comps.flag]++;
00286 
00287   return Error::OK;
00288 }

00292 CellListScanner *Range::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) {
00293   bool return_deletes = scan_ctx->spec ? scan_ctx->spec->return_deletes : false;
00294   MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_ctx, return_deletes);
00295   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++) {
00296     if ((*iter).second->include_in_scan(scan_ctx))
00297       mscanner->add_scanner((*iter).second->create_scanner(scan_ctx));
00298   }
00299   return mscanner;
00300 }

00303 uint64_t Range::disk_usage() {
00304   uint64_t usage = 0;
00305   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00306     usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00307   return usage;
00308 }

00315 void Range::get_compaction_priority_data(std::vector<AccessGroup::CompactionPriorityData> &priority_data_vector) {
00316   size_t next_slot = priority_data_vector.size();
00317 
00318   priority_data_vector.resize(priority_data_vector.size() + m_access_group_vector.size());
00319 
00320   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00321     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_compaction_priority_data(priority_data_vector[next_slot]);
00322     next_slot++;
00323   }
00324 }

00327 void Range::split() {
00328   String old_start_row;
00329 
00330   HT_EXPECT(m_maintenance_in_progress, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00331   HT_EXPECT(!m_is_root, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00332 
00333   try {
00334 
00335     switch (m_state.state) {
00336 
00337     case (RangeState::STEADY):
00338       split_install_log();
00339 
00340     case (RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED):
00341       split_compact_and_shrink();
00342 
00343     case (RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK):
00344       split_notify_master();
00345 
00346     }
00347 
00348   }
00349   catch (Exception &e) {
00350     m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00351     throw;
00352   }
00353 
00354   HT_INFOF("Split Complete.  New Range end_row=%s", m_start_row.c_str());
00355 
00356   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00357 }

00360 
00363 void Range::split_install_log() {
00364   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00365   char md5DigestStr[33];
00366 
00367   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00368     m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, false);
00369 
00374   if (split_rows.size() < m_access_group_vector.size()) {
00375     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00376       m_access_group_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00377   }
00378   sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00379 
00392   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00393     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00394     m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00395     if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00396       split_rows.clear();
00397       for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00398         m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_rows(split_rows);
00399       if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00400         sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00401         m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00402         if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00403           m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00404           HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00405                     "Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00406                     m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00407         }
00408       }
00409       else {
00410         m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00411         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00412                   "Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00413                    m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00414       }
00415     }
00416   }
00417   else {
00418     m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00419     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00420               "Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00421               m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00422   }
00423 
00424   m_state.set_split_point(m_split_row);
00425 
00429   md5_string(m_state.split_point, md5DigestStr);
00430   md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00431   m_state.set_transfer_log(Global::log_dir + "/" + md5DigestStr);
00432 
00433   // Create transfer log dir
00434   try { 
00435     Global::log_dfs->rmdir(m_state.transfer_log); 
00436     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(m_state.transfer_log); 
00437   }
00438   catch (Exception &e) {
00439     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating log directory '%s': %s",
00440               m_state.transfer_log, e.what());
00441     HT_ABORT;
00442   }
00443 
00447   {
00448     RangeUpdateBarrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00449     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00450     if (!m_scanner_timestamp_controller.get_oldest_update_timestamp(&m_state.timestamp) ||
00451         m_state.timestamp.logical == 0)
00452       m_state.timestamp = m_timestamp;
00453     m_split_log_ptr = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00454   }
00455 
00459   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED;
00460   Global::range_log->log_split_start(m_identifier,
00461                                     RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()),
00462                                     RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_state.split_point),
00463                                     m_state);
00464 
00465   if (Global::crash_test)
00466     Global::crash_test->maybe_crash("split-1");
00467 
00468 }

00471 
00475 void Range::split_compact_and_shrink() {
00476   int error;
00477   String old_start_row = m_start_row;
00478 
00482   {
00483     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00484       m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(m_state.timestamp, true);
00485   }
00486 
00487   try {
00488     String files;
00489     String metadata_key_str;
00490     KeySpec key;
00491 
00492     TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr = Global::metadata_table_ptr->create_mutator();
00493 
00497     metadata_key_str = std::string("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
00498     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00499     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00500     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00501     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00502     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00503     mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)m_state.split_point, strlen(m_state.split_point));
00504 
00508     metadata_key_str = std::string("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_state.split_point;
00509     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00510     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00511     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00512     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00513 
00514     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00515     mutator_ptr->set(key, (uint8_t *)old_start_row.c_str(), old_start_row.length());
00516 
00517     key.column_family = "Files";
00518     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00519       key.column_qualifier = m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name();
00520       key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(m_access_group_vector[i]->get_name());
00521       m_access_group_vector[i]->get_files(files);
00522       mutator_ptr->set(0, key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00523     }
00524 
00525     mutator_ptr->flush();
00526 
00527   }
00528   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00529     // TODO: propagate exception
00530     HT_ERRORF("Problem updating ROOT METADATA range (new=%s, existing=%s) - %s", m_state.split_point, m_end_row.c_str(), Error::get_text(e.code()));
00531     // need to unblock updates and then return error
00532     HT_ABORT;
00533   }
00534 
00539   {
00540     RangeUpdateBarrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00541     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00542 
00543     // Shrink access groups
00544     m_start_row = m_state.split_point;
00545     m_name = std::string(m_identifier.name) + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00546     m_split_row = "";
00547     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00548       m_access_group_vector[i]->shrink(m_start_row);
00549 
00550     // Close and uninstall split log
00551     if ((error = m_split_log_ptr->close()) != Error::OK) {
00552       HT_ERRORF("Problem closing split log '%s' - %s", m_split_log_ptr->get_log_dir().c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00553     }
00554     m_split_log_ptr = 0;
00555   }
00556 
00560   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK;
00561   m_state.timestamp.clear();
00562   m_state.set_old_start_row(old_start_row);
00563   m_state.clear_split_point();
00564   Global::range_log->log_split_shrunk(m_identifier, RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00565 
00566   if (Global::crash_test)
00567     Global::crash_test->maybe_crash("split-2");
00568 
00569 }
00570 
00571 
00575 void Range::split_notify_master() {
00576   int error;
00577   RangeSpec range;
00578   uint64_t soft_limit = m_state.soft_limit;
00579 
00580   range.start_row = m_state.old_start_row;
00581   range.end_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00582 
00583   // update the latest generation, this should probably be protected
00584   m_identifier.generation = m_schema->get_generation();
00585 
00586   HT_INFOF("Reporting newly split off range %s[%s..%s] to Master", m_identifier.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00587 
00588   if (soft_limit < Global::range_max_bytes) {
00589     soft_limit *= 2;
00590     if (soft_limit > Global::range_max_bytes)
00591       soft_limit = Global::range_max_bytes;
00592   }
00593 
00594   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->report_split(&m_identifier, range, m_state.transfer_log, soft_limit)) != Error::OK) {
00595     HT_THROWF(error, "Problem reporting split (table=%s, start_row=%s, end_row=%s) to master.",
00596               m_identifier.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00597   }
00598 
00604   if (Global::crash_test)
00605     Global::crash_test->maybe_crash("split-3");
00606 
00607   m_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00608 
00612   m_state.state = RangeState::STEADY;
00613   m_state.clear_transfer_log();
00614   m_state.clear_old_start_row();
00615   Global::range_log->log_split_done(m_identifier, RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()));
00616 
00617 }

00619 
00620 void Range::compact(bool major) {
00621   run_compaction(major);
00622   m_maintenance_in_progress = false;
00623 }
00624 
00625 
00626 void Range::run_compaction(bool major) {
00627   Timestamp timestamp;
00628 
00629   {
00630     RangeUpdateBarrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00631     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00632     timestamp = m_timestamp;
00633   }
00634 
00639   Timestamp temp_timestamp;
00640   if (m_scanner_timestamp_controller.get_oldest_update_timestamp(&temp_timestamp) && temp_timestamp < timestamp)
00641     timestamp = temp_timestamp;
00642 
00643   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00644     m_access_group_vector[i]->run_compaction(timestamp, major);
00645 
00646 }

00648 
00652 void Range::dump_stats() {
00653   std::string range_str = (std::string)m_identifier.name + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row + "]";
00654   uint64_t collisions = 0;
00655   uint64_t cached = 0;
00656   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00657     collisions += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_collision_count();
00658     cached += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_count();
00659   }
00660   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded inserts\t" << m_added_inserts << endl;
00661   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded row deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[0] << endl;
00662   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cf deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[1] << endl;
00663   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded cell deletes\t" << m_added_deletes[2] << endl;
00664   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tadded total\t" << (m_added_inserts + m_added_deletes[0] + m_added_deletes[1] + m_added_deletes[2]) << endl;
00665   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcollisions\t" << collisions << endl;
00666   cout << "STAT\t" << range_str << "\tcached\t" << cached << endl;
00667   cout << flush;
00668 }

00670 
00671 void Range::lock() {
00672   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++)
00673     (*iter).second->lock();
00674 }
00675 
00676 
00677 void Range::unlock(int64_t real_timestamp) {
00678   // This is a performance optimization to maintain the logical timestamp without excessive locking
00679   {
00680     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00681     m_timestamp.logical = m_last_logical_timestamp;
00682     m_timestamp.real = real_timestamp;
00683   }
00684   for (AccessGroupMap::iterator iter = m_access_group_map.begin(); iter != m_access_group_map.end(); iter++)
00685     (*iter).second->unlock();
00686 }
00687 
00688 
00689 
00692 void Range::replay_transfer_log(CommitLogReader *commit_log_reader, int64_t real_timestamp) {
00693   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00694   const uint8_t *base, *ptr, *end;
00695   size_t len;
00696   ByteString key, value;
00697   size_t nblocks = 0;
00698   size_t count = 0;
00699   TableIdentifier table_id;
00700   uint64_t memory_added = 0;
00701 
00702   try {
00703 
00704     while (commit_log_reader->next(&base, &len, &header)) {
00705 
00706       ptr = base;
00707       end = base + len;
00708 
00709       table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
00710 
00711       if (strcmp(m_identifier.name, table_id.name))
00712         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_COMMIT_LOG,
00713                   "Table name mis-match in split log replay \"%s\" != \"%s\"", m_identifier.name, table_id.name);
00714       memory_added += len;
00715 
00716       while (ptr < end) {
00717         key.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00718         ptr += key.length();
00719         value.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
00720         ptr += value.length();
00721         add(key, value, real_timestamp);
00722         count++;
00723       }
00724       nblocks++;
00725     }
00726 
00727     {
00728       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00729       HT_INFOF("Replayed %d updates (%d blocks) from split log '%s' into %s[%s..%s]",
00730                count, nblocks, commit_log_reader->get_log_dir().c_str(),
00731                m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00732     }
00733 
00734     Global::memory_tracker.add_memory(memory_added);
00735     Global::memory_tracker.add_items(count);
00736 
00737     m_added_inserts = 0;
00738     memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00739 
00740   }
00741   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00742     HT_ERRORF("Problem replaying split log - %s '%s'", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00743     throw;
00744   }
00745 }
00746 
00747 
00750 int64_t Range::get_latest_timestamp() {
00751   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00752   return m_timestamp.logical;
00753 }
00754 
00755 
00758 bool Range::get_scan_timestamp(Timestamp &ts) {
00759   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00760   return m_scanner_timestamp_controller.get_oldest_update_timestamp(&ts);
00761 }
